answers.answer: HiWelcome to the forum!I understand you are losing muscle mass. This could be causing your problem if it is also affecting the involuntary muscles of the body too. The other reasons could be stress, functionally small bladder, diabetes mellitus, diabetes insipidus, urinary bladder wall instability, UTI, stones and neurological problems. Consult an urologist.Limit fluids in the evening. Set up an alarm your self and try and wake up 3-4 hours after sleep and use the washroom. This helps a number of times to break the sleep pattern and you will with time automatically start getting up.Hope this helps. Please let me know if there is any thing else and do keep me posted. Take care!
